author: daxian-dbw
body:
The additional binary archive packages are `tar.gz` package for `linux-arm` build, `zip` packages for `win-arm` and `win-arm64` builds.

/cc @PowerShell/powershell-maintainers

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@SteveL-MSFT, are we supposed to create MSI package for `win-arm` and `win-arm64`?
@TravisEz13, about the signing, if we are going to release packages for `win-arm` and `win-arm64`, we need to sign the individual DLL/script files too, right?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: We should sign those as well.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw I think zip is sufficient for `win-arm` and `win-arm64` for now.

title: Update release build to produce additional binary archive packages
